languages.text: [Улыбнуться Нихель] "Это — мой спутник Паскаль Ханейманн. И ты зря решила с ним связаться".
[Smile at Nihel] "This is my companion, Pasqal Haneumann. And you made a mistake in meddling with him."
languages.original_text: [Улыбнуться Нихель] "Это — мой спутник Паскаль Ханейманн. И ты зря решила с ним связаться".

traits.locale_text: [Smile at Nihel] "This is my companion, Pasqal Haneumann. And you made a mistake when you decided to mess with him."
[Smile at Nihel] "This is my companion, Pasqal Haneumann. And you made a mistake when you decided to mess with him."
[Smile at Nihel] "This is my companion, Pasqal Haneumann. And you made a mistake in deciding to interfere with him."
[Smile at Nihel] "This is my companion, Pasqal Haneumann. And you made a mistake in deciding to interfere with him."
[Smile at Nihel] "This is my companion, Pasqal Haneumann. And you made a mistake in meddling with him."
[Smile at Nihel] "This is my companion, Pasqal Haneumann. And you made a mistake in meddling with him."

languages.text: [皮肉げに笑いかける]「これは{mf|俺|私}の仲間、パスカル・ヘニュマンだ。そしてお前の過ちは彼に干渉したことだ」
languages.original_text: [Smile at Nihel] "This is my companion, Pasqal Haneumann. And you made a mistake in meddling with him."

traits.locale_text: [皮肉げに笑いかける]「これは{mf|俺|私}の仲間、パスカル・ヘニュマンだ。そしてお前の過ちは彼に干渉したことだ」

languages.text: [对妮赫尔微笑]“这是我的同伴帕斯卡·哈努曼。你打算干扰他的计划，这真是个错误。”
languages.original_text: [Smile at Nihel] "This is my companion, Pasqal Haneumann. And you made a mistake in meddling with him."

traits.locale_text: [对雅珀微笑]“这是我的同伴帕斯卡·哈努曼。你打算干涉他，这真是个错误。”

languages.text: [Sourire à Nihel] « Voici mon compagnon, Pasqal Haneumann. Et j'aime autant vous dire que vous avez fait une grossière erreur en essayant de vous en prendre à lui. »
languages.original_text: [Smile at Nihel] "This is my companion, Pasqal Haneumann. And you made a mistake in meddling with him."

traits.locale_text: [Sourire à Nihel] « Voici mon compagnon, Pasqal Haneumann. Et j'aime autant vous dire que vous avez fait une grossière erreur en essayant de vous en prendre à lui. »

languages.text: [Sonreír a Nihel] «Estás hablando con Pasqal Haneumann, mi compañero, y has cometido un error al oponerte a él».
languages.original_text: [Smile at Nihel] "This is my companion, Pasqal Haneumann. And you made a mistake in meddling with him."

traits.locale_text: [Sonreír a Nihel] «Estás hablando con Pasqal Haneumann, mi compañero, y has cometido un error al enfrentarte a él».

languages.text: [Nihel anlächeln] "Das ist mein Gefährte, Pasqal Haneumann. Und es war ein Fehler von Euch, ihm in die Quere zu kommen."
languages.original_text: [Smile at Nihel] "This is my companion, Pasqal Haneumann. And you made a mistake in meddling with him."

traits.locale_text: [Nihel anlächeln] "Das ist mein Gefährte, Pasqal Haneumann. Und es war ein Fehler von Euch, ihm in die Quere zu kommen."

languages.text: [Nihel'e gülümse] "Bu benim yoldaşım Pasqal Haneumann. Ona bulaşarak büyük bir hata yaptın."
languages.original_text: [Smile at Nihel] "This is my companion, Pasqal Haneumann. And you made a mistake in meddling with him."

traits.locale_text: [Nihel'e gülümse] "Bu benim yoldaşım Pasqal Haneumann. Ona bulaşarak büyük bir hata yaptın."
